Body:
I am trying to build a basic GUI app for Windows 10 IoT Core. I'll run it on Raspberry Pi 3.

I have installed Visual Studio 2017 Community and Windows SDK 10.1.15063.137. When I am trying to make the app I am getting an error in VS 2017:

Please update Windows 10 creator 10.0.15063.6 or later.

I have already running SDK 10.1.15063.137. Then why does this error appear? In my project property ... target version is Windows 10 creators update (10.0
When the error occurs, build on desktop or deploy to Raspberry Pi 3 ? What's the OS version of your desktop and Raspberry Pi ?

You may need update your PC OS version to 15063. The same error is [here](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/64ef706d-601d-4f6d-8abc-83b2f5306421/uwpvisual-studio-requires-newer-version-of-windows-to-display-the-content-please-update-windows?forum=wpdevelop).

Hi.I am getting the error in my PC windows 10 when trying to open the VS2017 project MianPage.xaml file.		Below is the detail of all versions:		PC Windows 10 OS Version: 1607 (OS Build 14393.1198).	Windows 10 SDK Vrsion: 10.1.15063.137.	RPi3 Windows 10 IoT Version: 10.0.15063.0.		Can you please advice what I need to do to get this fixed?		Thanks.
Are you also running the same (or later) version on your development machine and the IoT device? You only said you upgraded the SDK, not the OS.
